verses.verse: At that time<WH6256> Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH6458> "Cut two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like the first,<WH7223> and come up<WH5927> to me onto the mountain,<WH2022> and make<WH6213> an ark<WH727> of wood.<WH6086>
I will write<WH3789> on the tables<WH3871> the words<WH1697> that were on the first<WH7223> tables<WH3871> which you broke,<WH7665> and you shall put<WH7760> them in the ark.<WH727>"

So I made<WH6213> an ark<WH727> of acacia<WH7848> wood,<WH6086> and cut<WH6458> two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68> like the first,<WH7223> and went up<WH5927> onto the mountain,<WH2022> having the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> in my hand.<WH3027>

He wrote<WH3789> on the tables,<WH3871> according to the first<WH7223> writing,<WH4385> the ten<WH6235> commandments,<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to you on the mountain<WH2022> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784> in the day<WH3117> of the assembly:<WH6951> and Yahweh<WH3068> gave them to me.<WH5414>

I turned<WH6437> and came down<WH3381> from the mountain,<WH2022> and put<WH7760> the tables<WH3871> in the ark<WH727> which I had made;<WH6213> and there they are as Yahweh<WH3068> commanded me.<WH6680>

(The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> traveled<WH5265> from Beeroth Bene Jaakan<WH885> to Moserah.<WH4149> There Aaron<WH175> died,<WH4191> and there he was buried;<WH6912> and Eleazar<WH499> his son<WH1121> ministered in the priest<WH3547>'s office in his place.
From there they traveled<WH5265> to Gudgodah;<WH1412> and from Gudgodah<WH1412> to Jotbathah,<WH3193> a land<WH776> of brooks<WH5158> of water.<WH4325>

At that time<WH6256> Yahweh<WH3068> set apart<WH914> the tribe<WH7626> of Levi,<WH3878> to bear<WH5375> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh,<WH3068> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> to minister<WH8334> to him,<WH1288> and to bless in his name,<WH8034> to this day.<WH3117>

Therefore Levi<WH3878> has no portion<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with his brothers;<WH251> Yahweh<WH3068> is his inheritance,<WH5159> according as Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> spoke to him.<WH1696>)

I stayed<WH5975> on the mountain,<WH2022> as at the first<WH7223> time,<WH3117> forty<WH705> days<WH3117> and forty<WH705> nights:<WH3915> and Yahweh<WH3068> listened<WH8085> to me that time<WH6471> also;<WH3068> Yahweh would<WH14> not destroy you.<WH7843>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH6965> "Arise, take<WH3212> your journey<WH4550> before<WH6440> the people;<WH5971> and they shall go in<WH935> and possess<WH3423> the land,<WH776> which I swore<WH7650> to their fathers<WH1> to give to them.<WH5414>"

Now,<WH3478> Israel, what does Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> require<WH7592> of you,<WH3372> but to fear Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> to walk<WH3212> in all his ways,<WH1870> and to love<WH157> him,<WH5647> and to serve Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> with all your heart<WH3824> and with all your soul,<WH5315>
to keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and his statutes,<WH2708> which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117> for your good?<WH2896>
Behold,<WH3068> to Yahweh your God<WH430> belongs heaven<WH8064> and the heaven<WH8064> of heavens,<WH8064> the earth,<WH776> with all that is therein.

Only Yahweh<WH3068> had a delight<WH2836> in your fathers<WH1> to love<WH157> them,<WH977> and he chose their seed<WH2233> after<WH310> them,<WH5971> even you above all peoples, as at this day.<WH3117>
Circumcise<WH4135> therefore the foreskin<WH6190> of your heart,<WH3824> and be no more stiff-necked.<WH6203>

For Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> he is God<WH430> of gods,<WH430> and Lord<WH113> of lords,<WH113> the great<WH1419> God,<WH410> the mighty,<WH1368> and the awesome,<WH3372> who doesn't<WH5375> respect persons,<WH6440> nor takes<WH3947> reward.<WH7810>
He does execute<WH6213> justice<WH4941> for the fatherless<WH3490> and widow,<WH490> and loves<WH157> the foreigner,<WH1616> in giving<WH5414> him food<WH3899> and clothing.<WH8071>
Therefore love<WH157> the foreigner;<WH1616> for you were foreigners<WH1616> in the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
You shall fear<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> your God;<WH430> you shall serve<WH5647> him;<WH1692> and you shall cling to him,<WH7650> and you shall swear by his name.<WH8034>
He is your praise,<WH8416> and he is your God,<WH430> who has done<WH6213> for you these great<WH1419> and awesome things,<WH3372> which your eyes<WH5869> have seen.<WH7200>

Your fathers<WH1> went down<WH3381> into Egypt<WH4714> with seventy<WH7657> persons;<WH5315> and now Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> has made<WH7760> you as the stars<WH3556> of the sky<WH8064> for multitude.<WH7230>
